title: IE University Health Protocols
caption:
At IE University your health comes first. Thanks to our safety protocols, we were able to return to the classroom back in June 2020, and have continued to ensure maximum safety since then.Â 

We adapted our facilities with thermal cameras, sign posts, separation panels, mass testing and so much more!

Going to class has never been safer!Â

Today is a historical date for IE University! Our logo shines on the faÃ§ade of the #IETower.

IE Tower reinforces IE Universityâ€™s commitment to driving positive change through #education, #research, and #innovation. It reaffirms Madridâ€™s position as a leading global educational hub.

At 180 meters high, with 35 floors covering 50,000 square meters, and 7,000 square meters of green space, IE Tower has the capacity for 6,000 students. One of the few high-rise university centers in the world, it is designed to be a benchmark for innovation and #technology in education and has also been built with #sustainability criteria and maximum energy efficiency in mind. #WeAreIE

Photos by Ignacio Itarte.

The #IETower will open its doors in September 2021. Its future-forward design reflects our mission to promote education as the key to sustainable development. 

With 35 floors, our tower will be one of the few high-rise university campuses in the world, with an impressive structure that reaffirms Madridâ€™s position as a leading global educational hub.
